title: DermOrganic Sulfate-Free Conditioning Shampoo, 33.8 fl. oz. / Liter Derm Organic with Argan Oil
description: Enriched with omega-6, antioxidants, essential lipids and vitamin E Conditions with vitamins and rice amino acids Luxuriously gentle cleansing for hair and skin DermOrganic Moroccan Argan Oil Hair Treatments are the new beauty ritual for unparalleled performance. Discover the beauty secret that women of the Moroccan desert have known for centuries! These argan oil hair treatments provide nourishment for the hair with radiant and healthy shine. Moroccan Argan oil, rich in omega-6, antioxidants and vitamin E, penetrates into the hair to create a barrier against the damaging effects of heat, sun and wind to bring back a healthy and natural shine. These professional formulas combine the healing properties of this ancient oil with the advanced therapeutic qualities of rice amino acids and grapeseed extract. In Morocco, the Argan Tree is called "green gold". Beneath its lush green leaves lives the golden rich oil prized for its therapeutic value. Moroccan Argan Oil is cold pressed from the nut of the Argan tree (Argania spinosa). The Moroccan Argan forest is protected under UNESCO's biosphere reserve regulations.

title: Eminence Clear Skin Probiotic Masque Skin Care, 2 Ounce
description: Unmask blemish free skin with eminence vitaskin clear skin probiotic masque.
